${modID}:TheDream.NAME: The Dream
${modID}:TheDream.DESCRIPTION: No past. NL No present. NL No future. NL All is one within *The *Dream.
${modID}:TheDream.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: No past. NL No present. NL No future. NL All is one within *The *Dream.

${modID}:Mutate.NAME: Mutate
${modID}:Mutate.DESCRIPTION: {@@} ${modID}:Dreaming. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=}. NL Discard !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=}.
${modID}:Mutate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@} ${modID}:Dreaming. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=}. NL Discard !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=}.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: {@@} ${modID}:Dreaming. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=}. NL Discard !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=}.
{@@} ${modID}:Dreaming. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=}. NL Discard !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=}.
${modID}:Dreaming. NL Discard any number of cards and gain !B! Block for each card discarded.
${modID}:Dreaming. NL Discard any number of cards and gain !B! Block for each card discarded.

${modID}:StarfireTotemist.NAME: Starfire Totemist
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: {@@} ${modID}:Dreaming. NL Deal !D! damage, based on the number of cards in your discard pile. (!${modID}:DiS!)
{@@} ${modID}:Dreaming. NL Deal !D! damage, based on the number of cards in your discard pile. (!${modID}:DiS!)

${modID}:SoaringTalon.NAME: Soaring Talon
${modID}:SoaringTalon.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! ${modID}:Valor{!M!|@=s|1=} to your hand.
${modID}:SoaringTalon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! ${modID}:Valor{!M!|@=s|1=} to your hand.

${modID}:ArcaneFocus.NAME: Arcane Focus
${modID}:ArcaneFocus.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Dreaming. NL Scry !M!. NL Draw a card. NL ${modID}:Mill !${modID}:M2! card{!${modID}:M2!|@=s|1=}.
${modID}:ArcaneFocus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Dreaming. NL Scry !M!. NL Draw a card. NL ${modID}:Mill !${modID}:M2! card{!${modID}:M2!|@=s|1=}.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Dreaming. NL Scry !M!. NL Draw a card. NL ${modID}:Mill !${modID}:M2! card{!${modID}:M2!|@=s|1=}.
{@@}${modID}:Dreaming. NL Scry !M!. NL Draw a card. NL ${modID}:Mill !${modID}:M2! card{!${modID}:M2!|@=s|1=}.

${modID}:Stormcall.NAME: Stormcall
${modID}:Stormcall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Prophecy: Deal damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:RhythmicSpiritualist.NAME: Rhythmic Spiritualist
${modID}:RhythmicSpiritualist.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Dreaming. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=} each turn. NL When exiting *The *Dream, lose this and gain {!${modID}:M2!|repeat= [E]|>4= [E] !${modID}:M2!} .
${modID}:RhythmicSpiritualist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Dreaming. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=} each turn. NL When exiting *The *Dream, lose this and gain {!${modID}:M2!|repeat= [E]|>4= [E] !${modID}:M2!} .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Dreaming. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=} each turn. NL When exiting *The *Dream, lose this and gain {!${modID}:M2!|repeat= [E]|>4= [E] !${modID}:M2!} .
{@@}${modID}:Dreaming. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=} each turn. NL When exiting *The *Dream, lose this and gain {!${modID}:M2!|repeat= [E]|>4= [E] !${modID}:M2!} .
{@@}${modID}:Dreaming. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=} and gain {!${modID}:M2!|repeat= [E]|>4= [E] !${modID}:M2!} , then do it again at the start of the next turn.
{@@}${modID}:Dreaming. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|@=s|1=} and gain {!${modID}:M2!|repeat= [E]|>4= [E] !${modID}:M2!} , then do it again at the start of the next turn.

${modID}:WakunaCrowfeather.NAME: Wakuna Crowfeather
${modID}:WakunaCrowfeather.DESCRIPTION: {@@} ${modID}:Prophecy {!M!|repeat= [${modID}:SPIcon]|>4= [${modID}:SPIcon] !M!} NL If the next card you draw costs 2, repeat this.
${modID}:WakunaCrowfeather.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@} ${modID}:Prophecy {!M!|repeat= [${modID}:SPIcon]|>4= [${modID}:SPIcon] !M!} NL If the next card you draw costs 2, repeat this.

${modID}:HowlingPlainsAlpha.NAME: Howling Plains Alpha

${modID}:HowlingPlainsAlpha.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, based on the number of ${modID}:Valors played this combat. NL Increase the number of *Valors played this combat by !M!.

${modID}:Dreaming. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Dreaming. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:AutumnSpiritualist.NAME: Autumn Spiritualist
${modID}:AutumnSpiritualist.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! ${modID}:Valors to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:AutumnSpiritualist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! ${modID}:Valors to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:TwoTomahawks.NAME: Two Tomahawks
${modID}:TwoTomahawks.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Innate. NL When you play a *Strike, add !M! ${modID}:Valor{!M!|@=s|1=} to your hand.
${modID}:TwoTomahawks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Innate. NL When you play a *Strike, Exhaust it and add !M! ${modID}:Valor{!M!|@=s|1=} to your hand.

${modID}:OneEyeOpen.NAME: One Eye Open
${modID}:OneEyeOpen.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times.
${modID}:OneEyeOpen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times.

${modID}:TokenofFriendship.NAME: Token of Friendship
${modID}:TokenofFriendship.DESCRIPTION: While this card is in your deck, add a *Curse to your deck when defeating an Elite. Add 2 when defeating a Boss.
${modID}:TokenofFriendship.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: While it seems finely crafted, you're slowly noticing little nicks and etches that seem purposely intended to lower the value.
